title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, ch. VIII, pt. 202 - Special Facilities Certified By The Commissioner For Drug Addicts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, ch. VIII, pt. 202 - Special Facilities Certified By The Commissioner For Drug Addicts

State Regulations
§ 202.1 - Special facilities certified by the commissioner for drug addicts
§ 202.2 - Hospitals with special facilities certified

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 14, ch. VIII, pt. 202

Statutory authority: Mental Hygiene Law, §§ 204, 205

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
